content: That's really helpful! I think I'll start with infusing gin with cucumber and mint separately to see how the flavors develop. By the way, speaking of gin, I recently hosted a dinner party and served a Cranberry Sparkler, which was a huge hit. I've also been perfecting my Negroni game - I've tried making it at home 10 times now since my friend Emma showed me how to make it. Do you have any recommendations for other classic cocktails that I should try making?
